content.rendered:
Thank you to all the students, teachers and volunteers who helped make the UKSDC Finals such a fun event – especial gratitude goes to Theo and the RfP Committee for such an innovative scenario to work with; it is safe to say that they pushed your creativity to new boundaries, ‘where no man (or woman) has gone before!’

The participating schools/clubs were:

Qualifiers from the UKSDC regionals
Bedes
Bedford Academy
Caelum
The Cedars School
Charter School North Dulwich
City and Islington College
Dartford Grammar School for Girls
Eltham College
Haberdashers’ Boys
Haberdashers’ Girls
Hills Road
Kendrick
Kings Monkton
Liverpool Bluecoat
Notting Hill and Ealing
QE Boys
St Dunstan’s
St George’s Edinburgh
St Olave’s
Waid Academy
Wallington Girls
Qualifiers from the UKSDC video competition
Chipping Norton
King’s College School
Magdalen College School
Space Entrepeneur Society
…and a special mention to ‘Team Choo’ for joining us when their competition was cancelled 🙂

Dr Perry, Sam Hession and myself (Jenny) will be working towards naming the ISSDC team this week – our apologies for the delay in the announcement, but we also ran the EUSDC this past weekend (due to staff illness).

 

Watch this SPACE!!!!!
